title: Robots to do 39% of domestic chores by 2033, say experts
description: Researchers quizzed 65 AI experts on which tasks robots are likely to do in the near future.

title: Tony Blair and William Hague call for digital ID cards for all
description: Ministers must harness the benefits of the tech revolution, former Labour PM and Conservative leader say.

title: Seattle becomes first US city to ban caste discrimination
description: But a Hindu advocacy group says the ordinance "unfairly singles out and targets an entire community".

title: US Supreme Court wary of removing tech firms' legal shield
description: A bereaved family accuses YouTube of abetting a terrorist group by recommending its videos to users.
